alert.note: Alert for Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 10:52PM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...In Virginia, Southampton County. In North Carolina, Northampton County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 7 AM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute on Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
